footer.slogan: Boost your TikTok career with gaming and live streaming experts

hero.title: Your TikTok Gaming & Live Partner
hero.subtitle: Learn how we turn gaming and live streaming passion into thriving careers

story.title: Our Story
story.content1: Founded in April 2024, FreshAgency was born from a unique vision: that of a creator who understands the daily challenges of the TikTok community. As an official TikTok partner, we stand out for our personalized approach to managing and optimizing gaming and live streaming accounts.
story.content2: Our mission goes beyond mere talent management. We are committed to transforming our creators' passion into viable careers, focusing on training, personalized support, and revenue maximization, particularly in the live streaming space. Our specific expertise in gaming and lives enables us to offer tailored support to meet the unique needs of each creator.
story.content3: At FreshAgency, we are not just an agency—we are a dynamic community where every creator finds their place. Our commitment to excellence and our in-depth understanding of the TikTok ecosystem allow us to guide our talents to success while maintaining the highest standards of safety and professionalism.

steps: Click on your profile at the bottom right

hero.title: Contact Us
hero.subtitle: Our team is here to answer all your questions

questions.question: Is it free?
questions.answer: Yes, it is completely free. There is no financial link between the agency and creators; they keep 100% of their income.

questions.question: Do you have access to my account?
questions.answer: No, we can only view your live statistics. We have no control over your account.

questions.question: Can I change my mind?
questions.answer: Yes, you can leave the program at any time if you wish.

questions.question: Where can I contact you?
questions.answer:
Via DM on TikTok: @fresh.agency
WhatsApp: 0768131479
Email: fresh.agency@hotmail.com

legalNotice.title: Legal Notice
legalNotice.intellectualProperty: All content, including texts, images, logos, and videos, is protected under intellectual property laws. Unauthorized reproduction or distribution of the content is prohibited without prior written consent from FreshAgency.
legalNotice.liability: FreshAgency is not responsible for external links or any damage resulting from the use of this website.
legalNotice.applicableLaw: This site is governed by French law. Any disputes shall be subject to the jurisdiction of the courts of Evry-Courcouronnes.

cookiesPolicy.title: Cookies Policy
cookiesPolicy.introduction: Cookies are small files stored on your device to enhance your browsing experience. They allow us to remember your preferences and provide tailored content.
usage: To analyze website traffic and usage.
To deliver personalized content and ads.

types.performance: Help us understand how users interact with the website.

cookiesPolicy.management: You can disable cookies through your browser settings. Note that some features of the website may not work correctly if cookies are disabled.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.personalDataCollection: FreshAgency collects personal information such as your name, email address, and TikTok account details when you fill out forms or contact us.
usage: To process your requests and applications.
To improve our services and provide tailored recommendations.
privacyPolicy.dataSharing: FreshAgency does not sell or share your personal data with third parties, except when required by law or for legitimate service providers.

yourRights.introduction: Under the GDPR, you have the right to:
yourRights.contact: To exercise your rights, please contact us at fresh.agency@hotmail.com.

privacyPolicy.dataSecurity: We implement security measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure.
privacyPolicy.policyUpdates: This Privacy Policy may be updated periodically. Please review it regularly to stay informed of any changes.
